title: (x) The "Mixonline" fonts - Tungsten, Sentinel {Akira}
content:
Hi,  
could anyone tell me what are the 2 fonts used in the [Mixonline website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416083956/http:/visitmix.com/) please ?  
I thought it was League Gothic and Romeral but seems don't.  
Here is an image :

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416083956im_/http:/typophile.com/files/homeWeAreACommunity_6211.png)
  
thanks for your help :)
author: Aure
